```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(phonItaliaR)
data("phonitalia")
```

```{r}
lemmas <- phonitalia |>
  distinct(lemma, gramCat, SumSylls, StressedSyllable) |> 
  mutate(
    stress = StressedSyllable - SumSylls
  )
```

```{r}
table(lemmas$SumSylls, lemmas$StressedSyllable)
```

```{r}
lemmas |> 
  count(stress)
```

```{r}
lemmas |> 
  ggplot(aes(stress)) +
  geom_bar()
```

```{r}
lemmas |> 
  filter(gramCat %in% c("G", "S", "V")) |> 
  ggplot(aes(gramCat, fill = as.factor(stress))) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill")
```
